text: FILE PHOTO : U. S. first lady Melania Trump hosts a roundtable discussion with tech leaders on the effects of the - RC153AF40210 WASHINGTON ( Reuters ) - President Donald Trump ’ s wife, Melania Trump, returned to the White House on Saturday after undergoing a surgical procedure this week to treat a benign kidney condition, her office said. The first lady, 48, had been recovering at Walter Reed medical center since Monday, when she underwent an embolization procedure to treat the kidney condition. Spokeswoman Stephanie Grisham said in a statement that Melania Trump returned to the White House on Saturday morning. “ She is resting comfortably and remains in high spirits, ” Grisham said. “ Our office has received thousands of calls and
